title: Residential Building Design Project for Climate Change Adaptation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational architectural theory, climate change concepts, and basic energy-efficient design principles
context.additional_context: Students learn design optimization through simulation tools utilizing real climate data and perform building design projects reflecting regional characteristics (referencing Tehran case) in teams.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more energy-efficient design solutions for residential buildings reflecting climate change scenarios.
Learners can analyze a building's thermal comfort indices (IOhD, HI, Humidex) using simulation software and derive improvement plans.
Learners can suggest optimal combinations of building design variables (shading, insulation, natural ventilation, etc.) by applying genetic algorithms and machine learning techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
